summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4625 for the improvement of 38th Avenue South from Charlestown Street to Genesee Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53859, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
